suite.name: FonctionnaliteDeBase

kw.name: Setup Driver
kw.doc: Initialise et retourne le driver Appium.

kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

kw.name: Initialize Language Settings
kw.doc: Sets up language-specific variables based on system language

test.name: Test Install Apk
test.doc: Tests APK installation process - Checks pre-installation state - Installs the APK - Verifies installation in system and UI
test.status: Test execution stopped due to a fatal error.

test.name: Test Uninstall Application
test.doc: Tests application uninstallation - Navigates through settings - Performs uninstallation - Verifies complete removal
test.status: Test execution stopped due to a fatal error.

kw.name: Fermer Driver
kw.doc: Cleans up and closes the test driver

suite.doc: Tests for APK installation and uninstallation - Verifies APK installation via ADB - Checks application visibility in UI - Tests complete uninstallation flow
suite.status:
Suite setup failed: Execution terminated by signal
Also suite teardown failed: Variable '${driver}' not found.
